pages.text:
Model Name: T-800
Base Durability: 4.0
Base Attack Damage: 0
Base Attack Speed: 1
AI: Turing-complete programming interface
Description: As most robots, the T-800 does not require air and is immune to poisonous substances. Continued operation requires 100 RF/t.
They do not recover from damages themselves and have to be repaired with a metal plating matching the material of the corpus. One plating will restore 2.5 hearts.
